entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.4°C

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening with risk of freezing rain. Clearing near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 late in the afternoon.
